Text: I downloaded this from oink a long time ago and absolutely loved it.  It instantly became one of my top 5 all time favorite CDs.  I liked it so much that after the first few listens, I ordered the CD along with Broken Nightlights compilation.  By xmas 2006 I decided to give this CD as stocking stuffers for a few friends and ordered 5 more.  It's an absolutely amazing CD.  Buy it if you like it!
